movie.title: Malina
movie.description_intro: A female writer and her relationships with two different men, one joyous and one introverted.
movie.description_full: A female writer and her relationships with two different men, one joyous and one introverted.

movies.title: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime
movies.title_english: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime
movies.title_long: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime (2020)
movies.summary: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.
movies.description_full: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.
movies.synopsis: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.

movies.title: Rollerball
movies.summary: In this fast action-packed thriller, Jonathan (Chris Klein), Marcus (LL Cool J), and Aurora (Rebecca Romijn) compete in a dangerous, fierce sport called Rollerball. Although, Jonathan and Marcus try to quit, cruel and vindictive promoter Alexi Petrovich (Jean Reno) encourages them to still participate. Petrovich sends his men to attack them while they are on a trip, but Jonathan survives. In the end during a game of Rollberball, Petrovich attempts a public execution of Jonathan, but the question is will Jonathan get revenge.

movies.title: The Glass Castle
movies.summary: A young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents, which sometimes resulted in the family living in poverty. Now engaged to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values.
movies.description_full: A young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents, which sometimes resulted in the family living in poverty. Now engaged to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values.

movies.title: Intruders
movies.summary: In Madrid, the boy Juan is terrified by the monster Hollowface and his mother is unable to protect him so summons Father Antonio to exorcise the monster from their lives. In London, the construction worker John Farrow is very close to his teenage daughter Mia. One day, Mia is spending the day at her grandparents' house in the countryside with her mother Susanna and she finds a box with the story of Hollowface hidden in a tree. Soon Mia sees the monster Hollowface in the closet of her bedroom and John defends her. When they are attacked for the second time, the security camera that John has installed does not show any intruder. Are Mia and John delusional?
